us.phonetic: /ɪnˈkɔrpəˌreɪt/, (v. in kôr′pə rāt′; adj. in kôr′pər it, -prit)

example.eg: Peter incorporated his favorite designs into his logo.
example.egtrans: 彼得将他最喜欢的设计纳入到自己的标识中。

example.eg: Jim incorporated his political ideas into his school presentation.
example.egtrans: 吉姆将自己的政治思想纳入到在学校做的演示中。

us.phonetic: /ɪnˈkɔrpəˌreɪt/, (v. in kôr′pə rāt′; adj. in kôr′pər it, -prit)

example.eg: Jeff's proprietorship incorporated a year after they started work.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 组建为公司, 组建成社团

example.eg: Ben incorporated his home business last week.
example.egtrans: 本上周成立了自己的家庭企业。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 把…组成公司, 组成公司
